text: The Polynesian Resort Hotel is a water park resort located in Wisconsin Dells, Wisconsin. It was opened in 1989 and became the Wisconsin Dells's first indoor waterpark in 1994. ==Overview== The resort is built around a tropical theme based on the Polynesian islands. Compared to its surrounding resorts and hotels, The Polynesian Resort Hotel is one of the smaller resorts in the Wisconsin Dells. It has a combined total of 200,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor waterpark, a restaurant, and an arcade. ==References== ==External links== *Polynesian Resort Hotel Category:Water parks in Wisconsin Category:Wisconsin Dells, Wisconsin
title: Polynesian Resort Hotel
